verses.name: John 7:29
verses.text: But I know him: for I am from him, and he hath sent me.

verses.name: John 7:30
verses.text: Then they sought to take him: but no man laid hands on him, because his hour was not yet come.

verses.name: John 7:31
verses.text: And many of the people believed on him, and said, When Christ cometh, will he do more miracles than these which this man hath done?

verses.name: John 7:32
verses.text: The Pharisees heard that the people murmured such things concerning him; and the Pharisees and the chief priests sent officers to take him.
